name: KryptoStorage Container File
summary: Learn about .KDE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Kaspersky Labs no longer offers KryptoStorage as a standalone product. Instead, the company recommends using Kaspersky PURE software for protecting personal data. Kaspersky PURE allows users to create encrypted virtual drives, which contain a KDE file that securely stores the data. The program labels this file type as a "KAV Shell Extension."

description: File created by KryptoStorage and other Kaspersky antivirus and computer protection products; saves an archive of files in a password protected, encrypted format; allows users to securely store and archive sensitive personal data.
